jyOtI(gm)#Shi kurutE suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyAnu#KyAtyaiq yath sa(gg)spRu#ShTA upadaqddhyAd-vRuShTyai# lOqkamapi# daddhyAqdava#r.ShukaH paqrjanya#H syAqdasa(gg)#spRuShTAq upa# dadhAtiq vRuShTyA# Eqva lOqkaM ka#rOtiq var.Shu#kaH 
paqrjanyO# Bavati puqrastA#daqnyAH praqtIcIqrupa# dadhAti paqScAdaqnyAH prAcIqstasmA$t prAqcInA#ni ca pratIqcInA#ni caq nakSha#trAqNyA va#rtantE || 4
(BrAtRu#vyO - lOqka - EqvaitAnyE - ka#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A1)
